mdRecord.dcterms:title: Hallway in the Mansion at Mt. Vernon.
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Johnson, N. G. (Newton G.)
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Cabinet card of the central passage in the Mansion at Mount Vernon with an oval-shaped view of the stairway looking towards the west entrance. A printed label is affixed to the reverse of the cardboard mount and reads: Hallway in the Mansion at Mt. Vernon. Giving a view of the old stairway, and the clock upon the stair; also, showing the ponderous old brass knocker on the west door, so often handled by Washington's distinguished guests. N. G. Johnson, Photographer, 426 7th St., Washington, D. C. A blue ink stamp reads: Copyright 1880 by Mount Vernon Association.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: p Central passage
